Name: Breakfast At Terrell's
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of coin-sized orange zest twist.
POUR first part of the sparkling wine into chilled glass.
FINE STRAIN into glass charged with sparkling wine.
TOP with sparkling wine (slowly pour to raise the head like a soufflé).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This creamy orange 'champagne' cocktail is almost as silky smooth as a Sgroppino .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 1999 by Jamie Terrell for Philip Holzberg at Vinexpo in Bordeaux, France.
Nutrition: One serving of Breakfast At Terrell's contains 188 calories
